title: Đừng Như Thói Quen (Korean Version)
lyrics: heulyeojyeoga neun chue ogsog nimo seub nan yeojeonhi tto ileohge neoleul jiwo ga ijeneun neo wa ~ a ningeos man ga ta ni salang-i ni ma-eum-i nal himdeulgeman hae ileohge neolbogoissneun de duson-e neoleul dama seo sigan-i jinaseo nal mannamyeon us- eulsu iss-eul kka apado neoege gagess ji neoleul gamssa an-eu myeo kkum-e seolado ni moseub-eul chaj- eulsu iss-eul kka tto ileohge neol jiullae ji nagabeolin naldeu l-e uliga salanghaessdeon sungan-i da salajinda malhae do ileohge neolbogoissneun de duson-e neoleul dama seo sigan-i jinaseo nal mannamyeon us- eulsu iss-eul kka apado neoege gagess ji neoleul gamssa an-eu myeo kkum-e seolado ni moseub-eul chaj- eulsu iss-eul kka
